summary: A comic oratorio inspired by La vida de Brian (1979) filmed at its only European performance at the Royal Albert Hall in October 2009 to celebrate forty years of Monty Python.
cast: Eric Idle|Michael Palin|Terry Jones|Terry Gilliam|Shannon Mercer|Rosalind Plowright|William Ferguson|Christopher Purves|Carol Cleveland|Neil Innes|Sanjeev Bhaskar|BBC Symphony Orchestra|BBC Symphony Chorus|Andrew Haveron|Stephen Jackson|John Du Prez|André Jacquemin|John Altman
keywords: monty python|claim in title|punctuation in title
title: No es el Mesías (Es un Sinvergüenza)
